title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\ListPatchJobInstanceDetailsRequest
name: ListPatchJobInstanceDetailsRequest
description:
Request to list details for all instances that are part of a patch job.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.ListPatchJobInstanceDetailsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The parent for the instances are in the form of projects/*/patchJobs/*.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: The maximum number of instance details records to return. Default is 100.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: A pagination token returned from a previous call that indicates where this listing should continue from.

params.name: data.filter
params.description: A filter expression that filters results listed in the response. This field supports filtering results by instance zone, name, state, or failure_reason.
